Secretary of C.C., WPK Meets Mexican Delegation
articles.content:
Secretary of C.C., WPK Meets Mexican Delegation 
   Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, met and had a talk with a delegation of the Workers' Party of Mexico led by Ricardo Cantu Garza, coordinator of its National Coordinating Committee, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.
